Package gameElements.board

Class Player

java.lang.Object
gameElements.board.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. The class stores information regarding cards, what side the player is on, and the energy.
Version:
01
Author:
Pranav Gunhal

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Board b, boolean white)
      Constructs a new Player of either the black or white side, and on a Board.
      Parameters:
      b - The Board on which this player is to be placed
      white - Whether the player is on the white side or no (false represents the black side)

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCards()
      Gets the Cards that this player can use
      Returns:
      5 cards that hold references to create a new Queen, Rook, Knight, Bishop, and Pawn

    • isWhite

      public boolean isWhite()
      Returns the side of this player
      Returns:
      Whether the player is on the white side or not

    • getEnergy

      public int getEnergy()
      Returns the energy of this player
      Returns:
      The energy of this player

    • useEnergy

      public void useEnergy(int used)
      Decrements the energy of this player
      Parameters:
      used - The energy that is used by this player

    • addEnergy

      public void addEnergy(int got)
      Adds energy to this player
      Parameters:
      got - The energy to be added to this player
